description: Details of Condition 20 (post construction BREEAM) pursuant to 15/01084/FULM for Re-development of site to provide a mixed-use development comprising of  73 residential units (Class C3) consisting of 12 mews houses (up to 3-4 storeys), 61 apartments (up to 7 storeys) and 139 square metres of flexible retail/commercial floorspace (Class A1/A2/A3/B1/D1) together with associated access and egress from Erith High Street and Walnut Tree Road, 45 car parking spaces and 141 cycle parking spaces, a drop-off space, refuse stores, plant and relocated substation at ground floor level, a raised landscaped amenity area at first floor level and associated highway works.  Demolition of existing electricity substation.
